title: FS:Rube Marquard Signed T206 SGC Authenticated
author: boneheadandrube

posts.post_title: FS:Rube Marquard Signed T206 SGC Authenticated
posts.post_content:
Freshly authenticated by the nice guys of SGC at the Philly show. I've had the card since about 1989, it would likely grade out a 60 if not for the signature. One of the nicer condition cards around signed by Rube, with an Old Mill back to boot. $Deal Made for Card....Thanks!


[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v70/gb-shop/Nonesense/RubeA1.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v70/gb-shop/Nonesense/RubeA2.jpg[/IMG]
This is a nice card. Would probably look great in my collection.
